phrases: Thank you all for allowing me to intrude on your valuable time.
I am sorry for your loss, Count Troyard.
What happened to Count Saazbaum is most regrettable.
When he was alive, my father was greatly indebted to him.
If it is in my power, whatever assistance you may request is yours.
Thank you, that is most kind.
However, now is not the time to wallow in individual sentimentality.
This is the time for the Orbital Knights to band together
and press forward with the invasion of Earth.
That is the best way to honor Count Saazbaum.
Our ships must sail forward together towards the same goal.
You intend to take the helm, then?
If I may be so presumptuous.
I understand that you are to duel Count Marylcian?
I find it odd to be fighting when we must band together.
Do not you agree, Count Troyard?
No lowly Terran could possibly be a match for mighty Vers.
Such an assumption creates an opening.
That is the current state of the Orbital Knights.
You go too far, Count Troyard!
As you are aware, I am not Vers-born.
However, being an outsider affords me a certain perspective.
This upcoming duel is also the result of an Orbital Knight's hubris.
I believe it to be my responsibility to teach him the error of his ways.
I am loathe to admit it.
Some portion of it, at least.
I shall leave the matter to your discretion, Count Troyard.
Your attack on Trident Base was magnificent.
Thank you for doing me the honor of listening to my many rude remarks.
All cruise missiles appear to have been intercepted.
Looks like a saturation attack is not going to work.
The firing range of its onboard beam weapon extends out to the Satellite Belt,
making air support impossible, as well.
They are about to make landfall.
Getting up close and personal is the only way, huh?
There was that manhunt all of a sudden the other day.
How do you suppose he escaped?
I wonder if Inaho knows anything.
Well, he went to interrogate him.
To think that such a simple mechanism can indicate one's bearings...
Such a device would only work on a planet with a magnetic field.
Now, then... Count Troyard and Inaho Kaizuka.
So simple, one cannot go astray, eh?
True of many things, I suppose.
Are you really going to fight the duel, Slaine?
I have been challenged, so I cannot back down.
This happened because I allowed Count Marylcian's visit.
It is the perfect opportunity to demonstrate my strength.
If I am victorious in this duel,
it will act as a deterrent against Orbital Knights who oppose me.
There is nothing to be concerned about.
Your dream might actually come true one day, will not it?
A Terran who had been held in contempt now holds genuine power within Vers.
I have felt it ever since we first met.
That you and I were kindred spirits.
Do you intend to hold on to your grudge against the royal family forever?
It is incredibly satisfying to see someone without a drop of Versian blood in him gaining power.
I think you will never let go, either.
You genuinely love her, do not you?
Would you let me help you?
if I am only my sister's substitute.
There is no way to evade that bastard's beam weapon.
Assume you are history if you are spotted.
A smoke screen that scatters everything from infrared to radar waves, eh?
Deploy on the south bank and keep that smoke up!
How are we supposed to get his attention and not get hit?!
Okay, I am patching you in!
A beam weapon can only fire in a straight line.
If we hide behind the curve of the Earth, it cannot hit us.
But since our shells follow a parabola due to the Earth's gravity,
they can reach over the horizon.
As long as it is possible to target the thing.
Curse them, how are they targeting me so accurately
The UAVs that were relaying our laser comms have been taken out!
We cannot get through to Ensign Kaizuka!
Do you seriously think you can bring down my Solis from that far?
Stand right there and monologue at me!
Be reduced to ash by my scorching light!
Go ahead and shoot, you frog-faced bastard!
I told you to get clear.
You disobeyed an order, Warrant Officer.
Hey, do not talk like you are superior to me just because you are a higher rank.
No little brother can order his big sister around.
These are flowers called roses that bloom on Earth.
Are you sure that you want to fight this duel, Milord Slaine?
I have fought for my life many times before.
Are you worried about me, Miss Eddelrittuo?
You used to glare at me all the time.
Roses signify many different things in the language of flowers.
Red roses mean I love you, while blue roses mean miracle.
But blue roses have one other meaning.
The sight of a lowborn putting on airs is offensive to me.
On the honor of Vers Orbital Knights, I shall exact punishment.
Usurping an official post out of self-interest without because
disturbs both order and public peace.
As the man in charge of Her Highness' safety, I will punish you.
This will be a duel between Count Marylcian and Count Troyard.
You are a slippery devil, just as the rumors say.
But can you escape from my Herschel's attacks?
Even with your predictions, not even you can cope with this many.
Well, well, you are fairly clever after all.
The flower language meaning of blue roses is miracle...
Is it... is it truly hopeless?
Will she truly never wake up again?
Is running all you can do?!
There is nowhere left to run!
You are the one who has nowhere to run.
is a simultaneous attack from all directions.
But here, your attack is confined to just one.
Material loading tunnels used during the moonbase's construction.
I have been mapping them out.
Who do you think you are, Terran?!
In accordance with the law, all of Count Marylcian's assets
are to be transferred to Count Slaine Saazbaum Troyard.
As official witness, I, Barouhcruz, certify the outcome.
You can see everything, cannot you?
But I cannot see what I really want to know.
I did not want to get you involved.
I wish to inform you, the 37 Clans, the new policy that we shall adopt.
We, who have acquired new lands and resources on Earth,
do not need to rely on the Vers homeworld forever.
and they must leave their mothers' protection
and strike out on their own.
will take Count Slaine Saazbaum Troyard as my husband,
and proclaim that I shall create a new kingdom here in Earthspace.
You were beautiful, kindhearted, and beloved by all.
You had everything that I did not.
But you and I have one thing in common, Sister.
It is a power that Slaine has need of now.
From now on, I am Asseylum Vers Allusia.
So you can let go, Sister...
Even if you are a puppet, you are still my sister.
